Even though she works at the tavern,
she still warns against drinking too much!

column2: I mainly work on unraveling the lineage and history of the Marquis's Family. — "What's the use of that?" you might ask?

column2: Those who dismiss the past will weep in the future. It's always been like that, no matter the era.
